DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate potential beneficial effect increase protein diet order decrease hepatic lipid accumulation high-fat diet . The investigator hypothesize increase protein high-fat diet suppresses lipid accumulation liver , change ( hepatic ) fat handle underlie reduce lipid accumulation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy body mass index ( BMI ) 1825 kg/ m2 ; stable dietary habit ; physical activity level . caucasian Unable unwilling comply study procedure ; caucasian Unstable body weight ( weight gain loss > 3 kg past three month ) ; Moderate intense physical activity ( exercise ) 4 hours/week ; ( Chronic ) disease might influence study outcome e.g . diabetes mellitus endocrine disorder , active cardiovascular disease , hepatic disease , renal disease , cancer ; Family history diabetes mellitus ; Use medication , except incidental use paracetamol ; Abuse drug ; Alcohol consumption 14 glass per week ; Participation another biomedical study within 1 month prior first screen visit ; Contraindications MRI scan . These contraindication include patient one follow condition : Claustrophobia ; Central nervous system aneurysm clip ; Implanted neural stimulator ; Implanted cardiac pacemaker defibrillator ; Cochlear implant ; Ocular foreign body ( e.g . metal shaving ) ; Insulin pump ; Metal shrapnel bullet ; Or metal contain corpus aliena eye brain .
